Notice Identifier: Awarded Transparency Only -  CY-Angliskos Stratos, Episkopi, Health and Social Work Services
Title: BFCCB/1390 - Community Health Care
Description: Contract BFCCB/1390  Lot 1 - Provision of Community Health Care (CHC) Services to British Forces Cyprus (BFC)  - Provision of a fully integrated and managed service for complete range of CHC services to include services:  health visiting; school nursing; child and adolescent mental health; dietetics, orthotics, chiropody and podiatry, pediatric orthotics, health promotion activities; speech and language therapies; new born hearning screening and community children's nursing.
Additional Text:
Advertised as CY-Angliskos Stratos, Epskopi: Health and social work services.  Advertised as 2 lots which were subsequently awarded as Lot 1 - BFCCB/1390 (CHC) and Lot 2 - BFCCB/1395 (SWS) 
This award notice is for Awarded contract of BFCCB/1390 is too large to load.  Therefore for a redacted copy of this contract please contract:  UKStratCom-ComrclD-07@mod.gov.uk

Title: Provision of Community Healthcare (CHC) and Social Work Services (SWS) to British Forces Cyprus (BFC)
Description: The provision of (or access to) effective, safe, efficient CHC to the entitled and eligible population. Statutory responsibilities are to be discharged in full; other services must meet acceptable clinical standards when benchmarked against UK NHS and the National Institute for Health and Clinical Excellence (NICE) guidelines and practices. Additionally, the provision of fully integrated and managed SW service structured to replicate the statutory services normally provided in the UK by a local authority. The Service needs to be consistent with UK best practice, evidence-based, and in accordance with extant MOD and NHS policy. UK legislation (such as the Children Act 1989 and the Children Act 2004) does not apply outside the UK, however BFC is mandated to replicate the spirit of UK legislation, where it is practicable to do so.
